title: Smart Data Models - PssIEEE1A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type PSS1A power system stabilizer model. PSS1A is the generalized form of a PSS with a single input. Some common stabilizer input signals are speed, frequency, and power.  Reference: IEEE 1A 421.5-2005 Section 8.1.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PssIEEE1A

a1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PSS signal conditioning frequency filter constant (A1).  Typical Value = 0.061. Default: 0.0

a2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PSS signal conditioning frequency filter constant (A2).  Typical Value = 0.0017. Default: 0.0

inputSignalType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of input signal.  Typical Value = rotorAngularFrequencyDeviation. Default: None

ks.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer gain (Ks).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Washout time constant (T5).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

t6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Transducer time constant (T6).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum stabilizer output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum stabilizer output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -0.05. Default: 0.0
